lyric:
[00:16.620]Where there's a will, there's a way, kinda beautiful
[00:20.250]And every night has its day, so magical
[00:23.940]And if there's love in this life, there's no obstacle
[00:27.810]That can't be defeated
[00:31.340]
[00:31.730]For every tyrant to tear upon the vulnerable
[00:35.150]In every lost soul, the bones of the miracle
[00:38.850]For every dreamer, a dream we're unstoppable
[00:42.630]With something to believe in
[00:46.060]
[00:47.290]Monday left me broken
[00:50.290]Tuesday I was through with hoping
[00:53.840]Wednesday my empty arms were open
[00:57.510]Thursday waiting for love, waiting for love
[01:02.560]Thank the stars it's Friday
[01:04.850]I'm burning like a fire gone wild on Saturday
[01:08.580]Guess I won't be coming to church on Sunday
[01:12.300]I'll be waiting for love, waiting for love
[01:17.050]To come around
[01:18.270]
[02:24.070]For every tyrant to tear upon the vulnerable
[02:27.790]In every lost soul, the bones of the miracle
[02:31.550]For every dreamer, a dream we're unstoppable
[02:35.610]With something to believe in
[02:38.420]
[02:39.670]Monday left me broken
[02:42.620]Tuesday I was through with hoping
[02:46.030]Wednesday my empty arms were open
[02:49.730]Thursday waiting for love, waiting for love
[02:54.660]Thank the stars it's Friday
[02:57.270]I'm burning like a fire gone wild on Saturday
[03:01.040]Guess I won't be coming to church on Sunday
[03:04.630]I'll be waiting for love, waiting for love
[03:09.230]To cover on
[03:22.870]
tlyric:
[00:16.620]有志者事竟成，多么美好的世界
[00:20.250]黑夜过去就是黎明，这里充满神奇
[00:23.940]如果生活充满爱，世界将不再有阻碍
[00:27.810]爱可以战胜一切
[00:31.340]
[00:31.730]每一个残暴的君主都能懂得怜悯
[00:35.150]每一个失落的灵魂中都有创造奇迹的傲骨
[00:38.850]每一个梦想家都有无法阻挡的梦想
[00:42.630]有真诚的信仰
[00:46.060]
[00:47.290]星期一我被无情地击败
[00:50.290]星期二我就在希望中复活
[00:53.840]星期三我张开双臂
[00:57.510]星期四等待爱，等待爱的到来
[01:02.560]感谢周五的群星璀璨
[01:04.850]星期六我像疯狂燃烧的野火
[01:08.580]星期日我将不会去教堂
[01:12.300]我会等待爱，等待爱
[01:17.050]等待爱的到来
[01:18.270]
[02:24.070]每一个残暴的君主都能懂得怜悯
[02:27.790]每一个失落的灵魂中都有创造奇迹的傲骨
[02:31.550]每一个梦想家都有无法阻挡的梦想
[02:35.610]有真诚的信仰
[02:38.420]
[02:39.670]星期一我被无情地击败
[02:42.620]星期二我就在希望中复活
[02:46.030]星期三我张开双臂
[02:49.730]星期四等待爱，等待爱的到来
[02:54.660]感谢周五的群星璀璨
[02:57.270]星期六我像疯狂燃烧的野火
[03:01.040]星期日我将不会去教堂
[03:04.630]我会等待爱的到来，等待爱
[03:09.230]让我痊愈
[03:22.870]
